channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Wants to Fight Democrats on Crime. They’re Treading Cautiously.
item.description: Democrats see the federal takeover of Washington as a way for President Trump to stoke fear for political gain. But they are mindful that issues of pu...

item.title: Protests Highlight Growing Discontent With Netanyahu and the Gaza War
item.description: Many Israelis feel that freeing the hostages cannot happen if the government refuses to come to terms with Hamas and pursues its policy of trying to e...

item.title: For D.C.’s Homeless, Strained Lives Become More Unstable
item.description: Some on the street have been forced to move, while others are fearful they could be next. Many face an even more uncertain future.

item.title: Inside the battle between the old guard and the upstarts for the future of the financial system
item.description: Fintech and crypto companies are teaming up in a fight for open banking rules.

item.title: Pop culture and politics are intertwined in the age of Trump. Just look at the Paramount-Skydance merger
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Zelensky Brings Backup to the White House, and Why Young Firefighters Are Getting Sick
Target’s CEO succession tilts toward an insider and company lifer
item.description: Target appears to have its next CEO waiting in the wings.

item.title: Dow futures rise as updates this week from the Fed and top retailers will test Wall Street’s big rally
item.description: Fed minutes are due, and top retailers will report earnings in the coming week. But the main attraction will be Jerome Powell's speech on Friday.

item.title: Trump trade adviser Navarro slams India for buying Russian oil
item.description: “If India wants to be treated as a strategic partner of the U.S., it needs to start acting like one," Peter Navarro wrote in a a strongly worded colum...

item.title: Putin’s Proposal for Land Deal, Made to Trump, Shifts Pressure to Zelensky
item.description: In Alaska, the Russian leader proposed that Ukraine hand over the remainder of the Donbas region to Moscow to stop the fighting.

item.title: Putin’s Proposal for Land Deal, Made to Trump, Shifts Pressure to Zelensky
item.description: In Alaska, the Russian leader proposed that Ukraine hand over the remainder of the Donbas region to Moscow to stop the fighting.

item.title: He Left a Belarus Prison 132 Pounds Lighter, but Just as Outspoken
item.description: The release of Sergei Tikhanovsky and 13 other political prisoners in Belarus was a diplomatic win for the Trump administration.

item.title: They Were Treated Like Orphans. But They Knew the Truth.
item.description: In Syria, the Assad regime took hundreds of children away from their parents. A Times investigation reveals the workings of the operation — and how on...
